title: Magic: an insiders view (MAC & PC)
brief_description: Comedian, television personality and magician Harry Anderson exposes the techniques magicians have kept secret for years. You have the choice of viewing the trick from three different camera angles, increasing the odds of the viewer being able to perform the trick themselves. This interactive CD-ROM also cover the history, lore and intrigue of the mystery that is magic. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS for Windows 486/33 PC or compatible with hard disk drive, Microsoft Windows 3.1, 8MB RAM, 5MB free hard disk space, 256-color or higher graphics card, 14” SVGA monitor, double speed CD-ROM drive, MPC-compatible sound card and speakers, keyboard and mouse, SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS for Macintosh with 25-MHz 68030 processor or better, Systme 7 or gigher, 8MB RAM, 5MB free hard disk space, 13” monitor, 256 colors, double-speed CD-ROM drive.
